title: In The Kite Runner, did the soldier actually have sex with Hassan's mother? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think she did. She is shown to be a bold character who isnt afraid ofnthe consequences of her action. Hassan himself was born out of wedlock, so considering her nature, yes she would have slept with him. Sorry for being judgemental.
From his dress the soldier made out that he was Hazara , and was just teasing Hasan. It would be inappropriate to say that his mother was sleeping around
